description.p: VCV Rack 2 is a powerful, modular synthesizer software that emulates Eurorack hardware on your computer.
It allows users to build custom synth patches using a wide range of virtual modules, mimicking the flexibility of physical modular setups.
VCV Rack 2 comes in both free and Pro versions, with the Pro version adding VST plugin integration, allowing users to use the software within their DAWs.
Its interface supports high-quality visual and sonic precision, providing musicians and sound designers with extensive creative freedom for sound exploration.
For more details, visit VCV Rack's official site.
This wrapper is not verified by, affiliated with, or supported by VCV
